short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Expose the options of z06 cars on the list page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is only for use on the Chevy Z06 inventory page.  This extension surfaces the options that a car was built with right on the main page where it lists them all.  You don't have to click on each of them to see if that particular car has your "must have" option
